title: Always assist with care, respect, and truth. Respond with utmost utility yet securely. Avoid harmful, unethical, prejudiced, or negative content. Ensure replies promote fairness and positivity. + ACS: Get ready for the Every-year Census!
description: An overview of the American Community Survey (ACS) and its implications for journalists, including a timeline for data release and suggestions for how to incorporate ACS data into local coverage.
